title: [K-12] Understanding Molecular Structure and Phase Changes of Water Using Multimodal Learning Activities

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic chemistry concepts (molecules, phase changes, etc.)
context.additional_context: Process including visualization and reflective review of chemistry concepts through smartphone-based digital animation production activities

learning_goals: Learners can represent the structure of water molecules using multimodal formats (text, images, audio, animation).
Learners can design and explain the phase changes of water through digital animation.
Learners can evaluate and improve their learning processes through peer feedback and metareflection.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
